TopicTitle: Staging tutorial in VAB - lockout from task completion

Articles.Content:
Hi,

As someone who played KSP1, I know the basics of how staging works already, so as PAIGE was describing what was going on, I was noodling around with the staging. Namely, moving and re-ordering.

Thus, when she finally asked to move boosters  to the first stage, doing so did not complete the task (I think probably because the stage the used to be first I already moved elsewhere or added a new one in). I had to undo to the start of the file and do it again.
Would suggest either:
- lock off building and noodling until she has finished talking
- a "reset tutorial" button that snaps the tutorial back to the condition that the game expects it to be in
- making the criteria for passing less strict

Cheers!
